Senior Citizen Fixed Deposit.Feature: A fixed deposit, also known as an FD, is an investment instrument offered by banks, as well as non-banking financial companies (NBFC) to their customers to help them save money. With an FD account, you can invest a sizeable amount of money at a predetermined rate of interest for a fixed period.
Senior Citizen Fixed Deposit.Benefits: A fixed deposit, also known as an FD, is an investment instrument offered by banks, as well as non-banking financial companies (NBFC) to their customers to help them save money. With an FD account, you can invest a sizeable amount of money at a predetermined rate of interest for a fixed period.
points: Monthly Average Balance (MAB) requirement not applicable

Standard Regular Fixed Deposit.Feature: A recurring deposit means making regular deposits. It is a service provided by many banks where people can make regular deposits and earn decent returns on their investments.
